notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was funded by the “Post-doctoral Research Aid” of the Specific Objective 1.1.1 “To increase the research and innovative capacity of scientific institutions of Latvia and the ability to attract external financing, investing in human resources and infrastructure” of the Operational Programme “Growth and Employment”, Project No. 1.1.1.2/VIAA/1/16/201, “The development of new synbiotic food products using enzymatic hydrolysis of plant by-product”.
